name: DEEEER Simulator
description:
Growing neck and stubbing corn. You can run around the town freely by using deer characteristics!
In a word, DEEEER Simulator is a “Slow Life Town Destruction Game”. You can spend a nice, slow life together with animals living in town, or destruct that town physically. Of course, if you choose to destruct town, you may be chased by police and have tragic end.
Let’s free the genuine power of deer through the life in town!
